name: Racer (itch) (LucioWins)
description:
Just a test for now

Controls

  • Accelerate - Shift
  • Brake - space
  • Arrow keys - turn
  • W - start wheelie
  • W, A or D -wheelie boost (while the bar at the bottom left is orange)
  • S - cancel wheelie (Braking also cancels the wheelie but doesn't give a boost)
  • R -restarts (If you finished then you can now race your best ghost)
  • Z - toggles more info (Current checkpoint and reserves)

Bike choice

There are three bikes so far  (beginner, intermediate and advanced) you start on intermediate but can change to any bike by pressing (3,1,2) and restarting the race

Stats

Top SpeedAccelerationTurningOff RoadStuntBoostBeginner2108774Intermediate555555Advanced932237
  • Top Speed is your highest speed without boosts
  • Acceleration
  • Turning is how quickly you turn
  • Off Road is how quickly you move when on dirt
  • Stunt is how quickly your Stunt Bar fills up
  • Boost makes reserves empty slower

UI

  • Current Best (Top left)
  • When racing a ghost finishing a lap will show the time difference for a second
  • Lap Times for your current race
  • (Debug) Current Checkpoint
  • (Debug) Reserves (Reserves are how much boost you have left, there are 6 but in the current level you can only get the bottom 4)
  • Bike Velocity (Bottom left)
    • Yellow - Nothing
    • Orange - Your fast enough to wheelie
    • Red - Turning loses speed (turning always slows your acceleration)
    • Purple - Max normal speed
    • Blue - Max boost pad speed
  • Stunt Bar 
    • when red you can't wheelie 
    • when empty you can start a wheelie
    • when yellow or orange your in a wheelie
    •  when orange you can get a boost (The more full the bar is the longer the boost)
